title: Hạnh Phúc Mới (Korean Version)
lyrics: Siga ni eol mana jina neunji geudae u s-eum soliga tteoolla jinan ji eolma an doel geosgatjiman neou i us-eum soliga deullyeowa uli neun neo muna dalkom haess-eo balaess-eoss hangsang hamkke hagileul uli ui salm-i kkeutnaneun nalkkaji hamkke han il-eul somang haess-eoseo bio neun geolie seo uli chueog deullina yu nan saeng-gagna haeng boghaess-eoss neunde uli ui kkum-eun haengbogha ge jinae neun ge jeonbuyeossneun de ji geum-eun nan uli laneun ge jeongmal uli leul wihae ga t-i geol-eossdeon geolien ije na geuligo i jen uimi eobs-eo tteona gi jeon-e malhaess-eos sji deo i sang seulpeohajineun ma uli ga hamkkeil su eobsda hae do
